segments.text: I see the girl standing near the boy, her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just wanting a treat from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice she's not trying to climb up herself, perhaps she's more cautious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is fixed on the cookie jar, just like her brother's.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that they feel the need to sneak around like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's posture shows her anticipation, she really wants that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother would give them cookies if they just asked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so typical of children, always wanting something sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is going to be disappointed if her brother can't reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they can get what they want without any trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
